channel.title: Introduction on Silence Speaks
channel.description: Recent content in Introduction on Silence Speaks

item.title: Silence Is Golden
item.author: me@silentsilas.com (Silent Silas)
item.description: Hey there! Welcome to Silent Silas. I write code during the day, and poetry at night. This is my playground. This section in particular is where I’ll discuss my terrible opinions on life, the universe, and the objectification of humanity. For the web developers out there, this is a static site built with Hugo, styled with Tachyons, sped up with Turbolinks, and animated with both ThreeJS and GreenSock. It’ll eventually use Service Workers so that the entirety of the site is available offline.
